title: Just got Leaver penalty for Riot's New Client
body: Ever since client update it keeps giving me directx error and I have to restart computer to get league to work this time I had to restart several times, before it worked, Has nothing to do with driver update etc like it says it's been happening since new client and your system is flagging my account need all the flags removed don't care about the lp I lost in ranked due to your company's incompetence just don't want leaverbuster shit on my account fix it thanks.

replies.body: I've followed the tech page tips you listed, also it says league needs to restart, league has reverted to an older version, and sometimes league closes itself it's not on my end it's your new client

> [{quoted}](name=lol baby ducks,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=6zxP4r3e,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-15T22:45:25.951+0000)
>
> I've followed the tech page tips you listed, also it says league needs to restart, league has reverted to an older version, and sometimes league closes itself it's not on my end it's your new client

I get this exact same error every time I try tabbing out of game with the new client. Nothing helps. The new client is shit.

We can't do much about leaverbusters, since those other players were still affected by you not being in those matches. The best thing to do would be to figure out why those errors kept happening and fix the main issue. 

You mentioned a DirectX error, which is a little different than normal graphics drivers, so it'd be best to start there and make sure that's fully updated too. If that doesn't fix it at first, run through the steps in [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115006740568--May-3-Click-here-if-you-ve-crashed-and-received-a-DirectX-error-or-if-you-see-an-offset-loading-screen-) as well.

"We can't do much about leaverbusters, since those other players were still affected by you not being in those matches." 

It is not our fault that we could not connect to the game, so why are we being punished for a problem with your client?? I am having the exact same problem, this is ridiculous...
